titleStmt.title: A Christian and brotherly exhortation to peace: directed unto the soverain states of England, and the United Provinces of the Netherlands. And to the people of both nations. Translated out of the French copie, sent by a lover of peace from beyond sea.
titleStmt.author: Lover of peace from beyond sea.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Wodenothe in Leaden-hall-street.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
